messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

access required tuesday november pm required hi please per thanks officer november re update hi board members please double teams best regards friday october update hi realize has passed since workshop also attended annual developments come towards well meeting next tuesday agree next steps then meetings meantime please find update how doing actions workshop done actions upload excel template found under knowledge base planning base planning planning template agree folder structure final agree structure clients centralize risks weekly meet voice concerns share knowledge progress investigate available progress available yet training old training progress created view detail give members share done training offer intro session please schedule mandatory presence rest optional sites implementing agreed structure structure re understanding implemented create files rotation visibility bench employees interested join planning process started review where find each contract po started move closer actions agreed next training client hiring directory mean change change involves come then communicate further log errors received logged lessons learned close gap client responsibilities gap plan introducing manage expectations move invoicing responsibilities billing role regards officer
